functions.name: isArray
functions.description: Returns `true` only if `arg` is an Array.

functions.name: isBoolean
functions.description: Returns `true` only if `arg` is a Boolean.

functions.name: isChar
functions.description: Returns `true` only if `arg` is a Char.

functions.name: isNumber
functions.description: Returns `true` only if `arg` is a Number.

functions.name: isObject
functions.description: Returns `true` only if `arg` is an Object.

functions.name: isString
functions.description: Returns `true` only if `arg` is a String.

functions.name: isNull
functions.description: Returns `true` only if `arg` is null.

functions.name: isUndefined
functions.description: Returns `true` only if `arg` is undefined.

functions.name: isPrimitive
functions.description: Returns `true` only if `arg` is a Primitive value.

functions.name: isReference
functions.description: Returns `true` only if `arg` is a Reference value.

functions.name: isNotArray
functions.description: Returns `true` only if `arg` is **not** an Array.

functions.name: isNotBoolean
functions.description: Returns `true` only if `arg` is **not** a Boolean.

functions.name: isNotChar
functions.description: Returns `true` only if `arg` is **not** a Char.

functions.name: isNotNumber
functions.description: Returns `true` only if `arg` is **not** a Number.

functions.name: isNotObject
functions.description: Returns `true` only if `arg` is **not** an Object.

functions.name: isNotString
functions.description: Returns `true` only if `arg` is **not** a String.

functions.name: isNotNull
functions.description: Returns `true` only if `arg` is **not** null.

functions.name: isNotUndefined
functions.description: Returns `true` only if `arg` is **not** undefined.

functions.name: isNotPrimitive
functions.description: Returns `true` only if `arg` is **not** a Primitive value.

functions.name: isNotReference
functions.description: Returns `true` only if `arg` is **not** a Reference value.

functions.heading: Arg Functions
functions.description: For checking the type of command line arguments.

functions.name: hasAColon
functions.description: Returns `true` only if `arg` contains a `colon`.

functions.name: isNumeric
functions.description: Returns `true` only if `arg` is a numeric string.

functions.name: isArrayIndex
functions.description: Returns `true` only if `arg` is an array index.

functions.name: isObjectKey
functions.description: Returns `true` only if `arg` is an object key.

functions.name: isFlag
functions.description: Returns `true` only if `arg` is a flag.

functions.name: isNotFlag
functions.description: Returns `true` only if `arg` is NOT a flag.

functions.name: isSingleFlag
functions.description: Returns `true` only if `arg` is a single flag.

functions.name: isDoubleFlag
functions.description: Returns `true` only if `arg` is a double flag.

functions.name: isTripleFlag
functions.description: Returns `true` only if `arg` is a triple flag.

functions.heading: Array Functions
functions.description: For checking the type of Arrays.

functions.name: isEmptyArray
functions.description: Returns `true` only if `arg` is an empty Array.

functions.name: isNonEmptyArray
functions.description: Returns `true` only if `arg` is a non-empty Array.

functions.name: isArrayOfArrays
functions.description: Returns `true` only if `arg` is an Array of Arrays.

functions.name: isArrayOfBooleans
functions.description: Returns `true` only if `arg` is an Array of Boolean values.

functions.name: isArrayOfChars
functions.description: Returns `true` only if `arg` is an Array of Char values.

functions.name: isArrayOfNumbers
functions.description: Returns `true` only if `arg` is an Array of Numbers.

functions.name: isArrayOfObjects
functions.description: Returns `true` only if `arg` is an Array of Objects.

functions.name: isArrayOfStrings
functions.description: Returns `true` only if `arg` is an Array of Strings.

functions.heading: Object Functions
functions.description: For checking the type of Objects

functions.name: isEmptyObject
functions.description: Returns `true` only if `arg` is an empty Object.

functions.name: isNonEmptyObject
functions.description: Returns `true` only if `arg` is a non-empty Object.

functions.name: isObjectOfArrays
functions.description: Returns `true` only if `arg` is an Object only containing Array values.

functions.name: isObjectOfBooleans
functions.description: Returns `true` only if `arg` is an Object only containing Boolean values.

functions.name: isObjectOfChars
functions.description: Returns `true` only if `arg` is an Object only containing Char values.

functions.name: isObjectOfNumbers
functions.description: Returns `true` only if `arg` is an Object only containing Number values.

functions.name: isObjectOfObjects
functions.description: Returns `true` only if `arg` is an Object only containing Object values.

functions.name: isObjectOfStrings
functions.description: Returns `true` only if `arg` is an Object only containing String values.
